channel.title: Item glitch
channel.description:
Ok,
I have created 4 new items in class8.java (client sided) with a "activate" function but when i click on "activate" it puts the item in the weapon slot how can i fix this.?

item.title: Item glitch
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

Tyvm! for explaining

Read full topic

item.title: Item glitch
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

This is client sided, but okay. I suspect part of your item code looks like this:

class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Activate";
The important part here is class8.aStringArray189[1]
If you use 1 as the enclosed index for the array, it’ll function as a weapon, like yours.

However, if you use a 0, like this:

class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[0] = "Activate";
It’ll treat the option in an identical way as food’s Eat option.
So from that point you can just use whatever you have in your server to handle food to make your functionality for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Item glitch
item.dc:creator: @Mee0345 Mee0345
item.description:
@Mee0345 wrote:

Okay. My first guess is that its mean to give a item in return? Coins? If so. Im not really sure. But I remember my friends source had cocaine and drugs and you right click and it has “Smuggle” and it looks like a guy shoving something into a bag lol. Im not really sure sorry.

Read full topic
